this_title: How We Tamed the Cat and Dog
trans_title: 人类是如何驯服猫和狗的
introduction: The latest archaeology and genetics answer the biggest questions about cats and dogs. Where did they come from? How did they end up living with us? Why do we love them?
chinese_title: 人类是如何驯服猫和狗的
foreign_title: How We Tamed the Cat and Dog
